class_description:
This immutable class specifies the set of domain parameters
 used with elliptic curve cryptography (ECC).

params.param_description:
the elliptic curve which this parameter
 defines.
the generator which is also known as the base point.
the order of the generator g.

Methods.method_description:
Creates elliptic curve domain parameters based on the
 specified values.

return_description: the elliptic curve that this parameter defines.

Methods.method_description: Returns the elliptic curve that this parameter defines.

return_description: the generator which is also known as the base point.

Methods.method_description: Returns the generator which is also known as the base point.
Returns the order of the generator.
